title: Studies in Performance—Fall Production
description: The in-depth study for a fully staged fall dance production directed and choreographed by faculty, graduate students, and/or guest artists in collaboration with student performers. Admission by audition only. May be taken for credit up to six times for a maximum of twelve units. Prerequisites: audition; department approval; concurrent enrollment in TDMV 110, 111, 112, 120, 122, 130, or 133.
